statements: SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, medications, treatment_history FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT diagnosis, medications FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = 2
SELECT * FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = 3
SELECT treatment_history FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = 4
SELECT diagnosis, medications, treatment_history FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = 5
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, medications, treatment_history FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'Cancer%';
SELECT patient_id, treatment_history FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Diabetes' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, medications FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE medications IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_id ASC, diagnosis DESC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients, diagnosis FROM PatientMedicalRecords GROUP BY diagnosis HAVING COUNT(patient_id) > 1 ORDER BY total_patients DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY diagnosis ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT diagnosis, medications FROM MedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%infection%' AND medications IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM diagnosis WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE dosage >= '100mg';
SELECT patient_id, treatment, date_ended FROM treatment_history WHERE treatment = 'Physical Therapy' ORDER BY date_started DESC;
SELECT diagnosis_text FROM diagnosis WHERE date_diagnosed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM medications JOIN diagnosis ON medications.patient_id = diagnosis.patient_id WHERE medications.medication_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT * FROM diagnosis WHERE date_diagnosed = '2023-01-15';
SELECT diagnosis_text, patient_id FROM diagnosis WHERE diagnosis_id = 'a5f84fb2-2bd0-4fe1-b9d4-40f7f151e5b1';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE patient_id = '6219c0e8-8cb1-4c67-ae09-e2bc7e7cf815';
SELECT patient_id, treatment, date_started, date_ended FROM treatment_history WHERE date_started >= '2023-02-01' AND date_ended <= '2023-02-28';
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE medication_name LIKE '%Aspirin%' OR dosage = '10mg';
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM Patient;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, start_date, end_date FROM Medication;
SELECT diagnosis, diagnosis_date FROM Diagnosis;
SELECT treatment_details as details, treatment_date as date FROM TreatmentHistory;
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM Patient;
SELECT * FROM Diagnosis WHERE diagnosis_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, start_date FROM Medication ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT name, diagnosis, treatment_details FROM Patient p JOIN Diagnosis d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id JOIN TreatmentHistory t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM Patient WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Diagnosis;
SELECT diagnosis_name, diagnosis_date FROM Diagnosis ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender='Male';
SELECT treatment_id, patient_id, treatment_description FROM TreatmentHistory WHERE treatment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM Doctor WHERE doctor_specialty='Cardiology' ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT diagnosis_name, diagnosis_date FROM Diagnosis ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_dob >= '1990-01-01' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM Doctor WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT medication_name, medication_dosage FROM Medications WHERE medication_dosage IS NOT NULL;
